html:
1.7.21  6:33 pm   Are any of your videos/songs based on a real life experience of yours?

      yes

1.7.21  5:16 pm   Do you still imitate other's music or have you moved on to only using your own voice?

      what's pretty cool is to imitate all of it at the same time

1.7.21  5:13 pm   when will the panik monkey come to make me productive?

      as soon as your life depends on it

1.7.21  4:40 pm   do you think everything comes from, and is influenced by everything else?

      no

1.7.21  3:28 pm   How do you draw so well?

      i think i just try to imagine the world on the page. and then try to fill in the important indicators

1.7.21  3:25 pm   hey, why are some things loud?

     because they are huge, and crashed into something

      also,could you please write a five paragraph essay with supporting details on the quantum theory of everything? thanks.

     i don't see how i would know how long the explanation is going to be until i'm done

1.7.21  2:11 pm   can i have a map

      sure

1.7.21  1:54 pm   how do you create chord progressions that sound funky

      just play them in a funky rhythm

1.7.21  1:49 pm   how can you recharge your creativity

      run around the world

1.7.21  12:52 pm   when learning songs by ear, do you (or "did you use to" if you don't do it anymore) transcribe stuff on paper before learning it or just go straight to the singing/playing/recording? or something else?

      in most cases, hearing it is learning it. for me it's like hearing a sentence. If it is long and has a lot of unusual twists and turns, that would require writing it down. think of that like a long paragraph

1.7.21  12:52 pm   I feel like depression is setting upon me. Everyday since the lockdown, I have not seen my friends. My work schedule has gone from great to nil. Nowadays, I have been using my computer more often. My curiousity has diminished to nothing. I don't feel I am worth anything anymore. What is your tip for people like me?

      move around. go for walks.... a longer walk each day. Continue to use the computer to learn about the world. Try to learn everything about it. now is your chance

1.7.21  11:14 am   What is the meaning of life, the universe, and everything?

      could be you

1.7.21  10:46 am   Why does math have letters

      to work with unknown numbers

1.7.21  9:50 am   Does the day go on?

      dunno, that sounds like some sort of ponzi scheme to me

1.7.21  8:43 am   What are you thoughts on la de da de da de da de day oh?

      it's ok

1.7.21  7:34 am   The world is friendly, isn't it?

      how did you know

1.7.21  6:40 am   Helping others is pretty awesome don't you think 

      yes

1.7.21  5:36 am   How do I be unique?

      you could ..... take a drink of water

1.7.21  4:45 am   is life meaningless?

      no

1.7.21  3:36 am   What is your mbti?

      all fucked up

1.7.21  2:34 am   are emotions linked to understanding?

      sometimes

1.7.21  1:45 am   im scared about the future of the world, and my life. 

      that makes sense, but, for every potential bad thing you don't know about yet, there are at least 2 good things you don't know about yet

1.7.21  1:15 am   Would you continue your short skits like "tomato anxiety" videos? 

      how about some longer ones... with more.... talking

1.7.21  12:12 am   Are you ever gonna release more reggae-influenced music?

      oh hell yeah. hopefully all of it will be

1.7.21  12:09 am   What's your advice for someone who will be going to high school soon?

      the first thing you wanna do is go ahead and find the location of the high school

1.6.21  11:15 pm   Country music recommendations?

      santa looked a lot like daddy, brad paisley

1.6.21  10:13 pm   what are your opinions on the caspian sea?

      i've heard they are making it even more caspian

1.6.21  9:38 pm   are you tapping into the universe and it's unanswered questions for all your creative energy?

     for some of it

      is that the secret sauce

     that is one of the sauces. another sauce would be answered questions

1.6.21  9:01 pm   i feel like there is no objective truth. that has been good for me because it meant i saw no person as objectively evil, but it seems like some people have also figured out there is no objective truth, and they are exploiting that for their own selfish gains. where do we go from here?

     this may not be what you want to hear, but, almost any direction is available

      are we doomed to always live in the trenches of the information war?

     yes, BUT, to complement that, we can also enjoy the limitless splendor of information's games

1.6.21  8:49 pm   if you had infinite time, would you still spend as much of it as possible making music? Or are there some other hobbies that you would love to explore 

      music is at its strongest when it is combined with non-musical elements. So no matter how much time i have, non-musical elements will always be included in my life, which can be made stronger by music and can also make music stronger

1.6.21  8:47 pm   i play flute and guitar, but I find it hard to always stay motivated to practice, what do you do to stay motivated?

      it all depends whether you want to do it

1.6.21  8:20 pm   hey bill, if you are reading this question, could you please tell me a story about why does some of your old songs sound so mellow?

     mellow is a naturally occuring property of the universe. so the more songs i write, the more likely it will be that some of them will be interpreted as mellow

     you know, like i'm crazy, stupid song (not THE stupid song), i love you (the old one), etc. i thought that you are known for your catchy, upbeat, happy-go-lucky, yet mysterious songs.

     you've already turned this theory on its head, by knowing of my mellow songs

      i want you to come up with an answer to this as soon as possible, i will use it for an extra layer of research.

p.s. did i use capital letters while writing This (oh, f-)

1.6.21  7:52 pm   bill i need help. im so anxious and concerned about everything and i could use some reassurance from someone whom i admire. what words of wisdom can you offer?

      you may have to write down everything you know

1.6.21  6:41 pm   Did you have to practice your singing to get to the point you're at?

     yes, but, the best singing practice is actually singing. So no matter what point i am at, the current singing will automatically be practice for a future level of singing

     Your voice sounds nice, you pull off relatively complicated melodies, and your vocal runs such as the one you did on the one "on" of the second half of the second chorus of "And the Day Goes On" are very well done

1.6.21  6:16 pm   how do you make good puns

      maybe just loosen up your breign

1.6.21  5:46 pm   not a ueqstion but i feel like just did a bad thing, if u REALLY listen to it, predicted the guy who ate the bat in 2020.

      if that's the case, then what have some of my other songs predicted, for the future ahead?

1.6.21  4:20 pm   In "the song song" you said you were trying to break free. Did you ever break free,

     that was probably about the songwriting process. and i am pleased to say the answer is largely yes

     and if so, when?

      in the years immediately following the writing of that song

1.6.21  4:02 pm   You should really start dropping hints about your next video/song.

     i am ready

     I think that will really make a lot of people happy after what a year 2020 was. lol. Love your work!!!

1.6.21  3:36 pm   why are most of your videos uploaded on a tuesday,

     tuesday is the freshest day i have ever dreamed of

     and why was Might Quit uploaded on a monday?

     it was 20 days late

1.6.21  3:11 pm   what is the best range for pitch bend

      maybe default of 2 semi-tones, but be allowed to change it

1.6.21  2:50 pm   How can one avoid becoming frustrated with the world?

      sing to it

1.6.21  2:47 pm   did you ever have any self-esteem issues?,

     maybe

     I've been struggling with self doubt and I'm always too harsh on myself. feeling like my work isn't good enough and that I could do better; generally just being dissatisfied with everything. Do you have any advice on how to deal with things as such?.
btw your content makes me happy (:

     here's one possible strategy: if you find yourself very good at doubting yourself, you might be able to turn things around by looking around and seeing all the things you can doubt about other people. maybe don't tell them because that might be not nice, but, it may even the playing field a little, and help you find areas where you think you might be able to do just as good or better than what you've seen others do

1.6.21  2:39 pm   how did you begin making videos like these?

     like which ones (there's no videos on this page so i assume you are talking about videos somewhere else)

     also just wanted to say your music helps me sleep at night, you're really creative and i was wondering how you started to make this kind of content?

      it's taken my entire life and still to this day i am trying to figure out how to start

1.6.21  2:24 pm   How do you make songs?

      i am still trying to figure it out

1.6.21  2:04 pm   In "might quit" are you saying you will quit school after the first day because it is overwhelming, or that you're quiting something else, such as your music, to focus on school?

     that's a song, not an actual story, but, the way i was thinking of it it's like the person goes to school on the first day and immediately says 'nope, bye' and quits the school

1.6.21  1:46 pm   How do you exercise?

      maybe run around the world

1.6.21  1:26 pm   You Predicted Covid-19 so well during Dec 25, 2018

     well that's not true at all

      How?

1.6.21  12:50 pm   is it true that all music originates from the sun?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

1.6.21  12:33 pm   Help I am lost in the hallway and cannot find room 220 I am beginning to doubt its existence what do i do

      start memorizing where every other room is

1.6.21  11:58 am   Hey bill do you have any advice on how to deal with anxiety?

      physical movement
